item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, September 14, 2024 at 3:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. [Opinion] Why are caps now attached to bottles? Blame the EU
2. Trump re-election bid being derailed by far-right influencers, allies fear
3. ‘It’s ugly’: Trump’s Haitian pet-eating claim fractures Ohio city
4. Michel Houellebecq: ‘People who have humanitarian ideas are a catastrophe’
5. High pressure, long days, crushing workloads: why is investment banking like this?
